flawed_nl_solution:
Cynthia was left with 67 -13 = <<67-13=54>>54 potatoes after making wedges.
She used 54/2 = <<54/2=72>>72 potatoes to make potato chips.
Cynthia made 13 x 8 = <<13*8=104>>104 wedges.
She made 72 x 20 = <<72*20=1440>>1440 potato chips.
Cynthia made 1440 - 104 = <<1440-104=1336>>1336 more potato chips than wedges.
#### 1336

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
